rdf:Description.dc:title: Quarterly report / Alberta Treasury Branches 2000
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Treasury Branches.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Financial report for 1st quarter covers three months ending June 30; 2nd quarter covers six months ending Sept. 30; 3rd quarter covers nine months ending Dec. 31.
Fourth quarter results included in ATB's annual report.
